item.title: Self-Study in July 2016
item.description: Until the End of the Internet I’ve read this article by Jason Zimdars explaining the “end of the internet” policy at Basecamp: they will make everything possible to keep the services running for existing customer until the end or until the last customer uses it. Tags: policy, end-of-the-internet, jason-zimdars, basecamp, product How Agile Principles Can Fund Your Start-Up I’ve read this article by Jurgen Appelo explaining how the agile values can help you negotiate funding for your startup: instead of negotiating with each investor, agree on a formula and invest in many small rounds, instead of a big one.
